author: Amanda Jackson, CNN
title: Police are arresting and fining people for violating social distancing orders
description: Across the nation, people are under strict orders to follow social distancing guidelines in order to lower the risk of coronavirus spreading.
content:
(CNN)Across the nation, people are under strict orders to follow social distancing guidelines in order to lower the risk of coronavirus spreading.
